mongo.description:
Interact with MongoDb
Specify reads, writes, aggregations, with AWS integration to support secret connection strings
----------------

EXAMPLE - upsert

cli-db mongo \
 -u 'mongodb://localhost:27018' \
 -b 'test' \
 -c 'todo' \
 -m 'updateOne' \
 -q '{"id": "123"}' \
 -d '{"$set": {"id": "123", "title": "buy toothpaste"}}' \
 -o '{"upsert": true}'

----------------

EXAMPLE - read from secret connection

cli-db mongo \
 -l 'your-aws-profile-name-here' \
 -s 'test-mongo-local' \
 -r 'us-west-2' \
 -b 'test' \
 -c 'todo' \
 -m 'findOne' \
 -q '{"id": "123"}'

file.name: file
file.description: the file path with content for the data

input.name: input
input.description: the path to assign input for the data query

options.name: options
options.description: the json string for mongo query options

awsSecretUrl.name: awsSecretUrl
awsSecretUrl.description: aws secret containing mongo connection string
